summary.body: I have searched the list and found some recommendations from a while back, which I'll follow up. But any other suggestions would be welcome, for a local, friendly (and sympathetic to a backlog due to illness) accountant for a self-employed sole trader.   Thanks
summary.subject: Looking for an accountant

summary.body: Not sure if this should be in the classifieds  but anyway. I've recently become self employed and I'm looking for an accountant  can anybody advise? Thanks
summary.subject: Accountant
